name: Fall From Shape
description:
Tap anywhere while playing.

Whichever you choose, press and hold to move paddle.

Release and it will move in the other direction.

Sometimes the current changes.

Other times you are up side down.

Catch all things except those that are negated (big and dark).

Get highest score.

Get achievements - all achievements!

Get to play fast

Get the fancy paddle

Reach completeness.

Become fantastic.

Feedback

If you have any comments, find bugs or just want to say "Hi" you can get to my twitter from the game's menu.
